mapper.select: select ID, OPER, PHONENUMBER, SHIPPINGPAYMENTTYPE, COMPANYNAME, PERSONNAME, SITEID, COUNTRYCODE, FEDERALTAXID, OPERFLAG, OPERTIME, COUNTRYNAME, LANGUAGECODE, PASSWORD, DUTYPAYMENTTYPE, ADDRESSLINE, POSTALCODE, SHIPPERACCOUNTNUMBER, CITY from db_dhluser where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ID, OPER, PHONENUMBER, SHIPPINGPAYMENTTYPE, COMPANYNAME, PERSONNAME, SITEID, COUNTRYCODE, FEDERALTAXID, OPERFLAG, OPERTIME, COUNTRYNAME, LANGUAGECODE, PASSWORD, DUTYPAYMENTTYPE, ADDRESSLINE, POSTALCODE, SHIPPERACCOUNTNUMBER, CITY from db_dhluser
mapper.sql: ID , OPER , PHONENUMBER , SHIPPINGPAYMENTTYPE , COMPANYNAME , PERSONNAME , SITEID , COUNTRYCODE , FEDERALTAXID , OPERFLAG , OPERTIME , COUNTRYNAME , LANGUAGECODE , PASSWORD , DUTYPAYMENTTYPE , ADDRESSLINE , POSTALCODE , SHIPPERACCOUNTNUMBER , CITY

ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PHONENUMBER = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHIPPINGPAYMENTTYPE = #{shippingpaymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
COMPANYNAME = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PERSONNAME = #{personname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SITEID = #{siteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
COUNTRYCODE = #{countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FEDERALTAXID = #{federaltaxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERFLAG = #{operflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
COUNTRYNAME = #{countryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LANGUAGECODE = #{languagecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DUTYPAYMENTTYPE = #{dutypaymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ADDRESSLINE = #{addressline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
POSTALCODE = #{postalcode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERACCOUNTNUMBER = #{shipperaccountnumber,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PHONENUMBER = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHIPPINGPAYMENTTYPE = #{shippingpaymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

ADDRESSLINE = #{addressline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,

SHIPPERACCOUNTNUMBER = #{shipperaccountnumber,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,

, 1=1
